Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Controller of the application. Links the view with the model.

    • executeAction

      private boolean executeAction​(java.lang.String[] arguments)
      Execute the action entered by the user.
      Parameters:
      arguments - commands entered by the user. The first string is the action and the second is the object on which the action will be applied.
      Returns:
      true if the user has entered the `quit` command, else false.
